name: Strength
description: Physical power and muscle.

name: Dexterity
description: Agility, reflexes, and coordination.

name: Stamina
description: Endurance, health, and resilience.

name: Charisma
description: Charm, personal magnetism, and influence.

name: Manipulation
description: Ability to influence and deceive.

name: Appearance
description: Physical attractiveness and ability to impress.

name: Perception
description: Awareness and ability to notice details.

name: Intelligence
description: Cognitive capacity and ability to learn.

name: Wits
description: Quick thinking and mental agility.

name: Allies
description: Mortal confederates, usually family or friends.

name: Contacts
description: The information sources the character possesses.

name: Fame
description: How well-known the character is among mortals.

name: Generation
description: How far removed from Caine the character is.

name: Herd
description: The vessels to which the character has free and safe access.

name: Influence
description: The character's political power within mortal society.

name: Mentor
description: The Kindred patron who advises and supports the character.

name: Resources
description: Wealth, belongings, and income.

name: Retainers
description: Followers, guards, and servants.

name: Status
description: A measure of the character's standing in Kindred society.

name: Acute Sense
description: One of your senses is exceptionally sharp, be it sight, hearing, smell, touch, or taste. The difficulties for all tasks involving the use of this particular sense are reduced by two. This Merit can be combined with the Discipline of Auspex to produce superhuman sensory acuity.

name: Ambidextrous
description: You have a high degree of off-hand dexterity and can perform tasks with the 'wrong' hand at no penalty. The rules for taking multiple actions still apply, but you do not suffer a difficulty penalty if you use two weapons or are forced to use your off hand.

name: Bruiser
description: Your appearance is sufficiently thug-like to inspire fear or at least an aversion in others. Add two dice to all Intimidation rolls.

name: Early Riser
description: No matter what time of day it is, you always manage to wake up at least one hour before everyone else (or even earlier, depending on the Storyteller). You are even functional at this time.

name: Eat Food
description: You have the capacity to eat food and drink liquids, and enjoy doing so. You still gain no nourishment from consuming ordinary food and drink.

name: Efficient Digestion
description: You are able to draw more than the usual amount of nourishment from blood. Every two Blood Points ingested increases your blood pool by three.

name: Friendly Face
description: You have a face that inspires trust, giving you two extra dice on all appropriate Social rolls.

name: Inoffensive to Animals
description: Animals are not disturbed by your presence, and they treat you as they would a mortal.

name: Light Sleeper
description: You can awaken instantly at any sign of trouble or danger, and you do so without any sleep or grogginess penalties.

name: Bard's Tongue
description: You speak the truth, uncannily and infallibly, but not always consciously. The truths you reveal will be real, but not necessarily obvious or immediate, and always somehow unpleasant.

name: Blush of Health
description: You look more hale and healthy in appearance than other vampires, gaining a rosy hue to your skin and a more animated appearance.

name: Enchanting Voice
description: There is something in your voice, a resonance, an almost hypnotic quality. You receive two extra dice on any rolls that involve the use of the voice.

name: Eidetic Memory
description: You can remember things seen and heard with perfect detail. You can automatically recall any sight or sound accurately.

name: Medium
description: You possess the natural affinity to sense and hear spirits, ghosts, and shades. Though you cannot see them, you can hear them and speak to them when they are present.

name: Calm Heart
description: You are naturally calm and well-composed, and you remain so even under pressure. You receive two extra dice to resist frenzy.

name: Iron Will
description: When you are determined and your mind is set, nothing can thwart you from your goals. When you are affected by a Dominate power, you may spend a point of Willpower to shake off the effects completely.

name: Luck
description: You were born lucky — or else the Devil looks after his own. Either way, once per game session you may re-roll three failed rolls.

name: Catlike Balance
description: You possess an innate perfect sense of balance. All balance-related rolls are at -2 difficulty.

name: Double Jointed
description: Your character is unusually supple. Reduce difficulty rolls by two for escaping from bonds, fitting through tight spaces, or any other contortionist tasks.

name: Bad Sight
description: Your sight is defective. The difficulties of all dice rolls related to vision are increased by two. This Flaw is neither short-sightedness nor myopia; it is not correctable with lenses and will remain with the character forever.

name: Hard of Hearing
description: Your hearing is defective. The difficulties of all dice rolls related to hearing are increased by two.

name: Short
description: You are well below average height — four and a half feet tall or less. You have difficulty reaching or manipulating objects designed for normal adult size, and your running speed is halved.

name: Smell of the Grave
description: You exude an odor of dampness and newly turned earth, which cannot be concealed by perfumes, deodorants, or other common means. Mortals in your immediate presence are at +1 difficulty to all Social rolls.

name: Tic/Twitch
description: You have some sort of repetitive motion that you make in times of stress, and it is a dead give-away as to your true emotional state. The difficulty of all rolls to detect your deception in such situations is reduced by two.

name: Vengeful
description: You have a score to settle, incurred either during your mortal days or after the Embrace. You are obsessed with taking your revenge on an individual or group, and it is your overriding priority in any situation where you encounter the object of your revenge. You may temporarily resist your need for vengeance by spending a Willpower point.

name: Victim of the Masquerade
description: The Camarilla's propaganda machine did too good a job on you. Even after your Embrace you refused to believe you were a vampire. You remain convinced that there is some logical explanation for your condition, and spend as much time as you can searching for it. You also have problems feeding, and may insist on trying to eat regular food. None of these habits makes you particularly pleasant company for other Kindred. This Flaw must be roleplayed at all times, and is generally taken by Camarilla vampires.

name: Weak-Willed
description: You are highly susceptible to Dominate and intimidation by others; Dominate attempts automatically affect you unless the Discipline wielder is of higher Generation, and your difficulties to resist Social abilities such as Intimidation or Leadership, as well as mind-altering spells or magic, are increased by two. Your Willpower Trait may never rise above 4.

name: Conspicuous Consumption
description: It is not enough for you to draw nourishment from the blood of mortals — you believe you must also consume your victim's heart, liver, and other blood-rich tissue. Of course, this will necessitate the deaths of all of your victims (unless you are extremely creative), which might lead to numerous problems with maintaining Humanity (and a low profile). Characters with this Flaw should additionally purchase the Eat Food Merit.

name: Guilt-Wracked
description: You simply cannot come to grips with the fact that you must drink blood to survive. You suffer horrible guilt over each time you feed (roll Conscience, difficulty 7, or else frenzy every time you feed — characters with the Conviction Virtue cannot take this Flaw) and try to avoid doing so as much as possible. This means that you rarely have much blood in your system, leaving you vulnerable to both attacks and hunger-based frenzies.

name: Flashbacks
description: You managed to make it through the Creation Rites or other similarly traumatic experience, but not wholly intact. The most insignificant thing can throw you into a different mood or state of mind, and as such your behavior is extremely unpredictable. Because of your precarious emotional state, your Willpower fluctuates. At the beginning of each story, make a Willpower roll (you may not spend Willpower for an automatic success). If you succeed, you may participate in the story as normal. If you fail, however, your Willpower score is considered to be 1 for the duration of that session, and you only have one Willpower point to spend. You may roll again at the beginning of the next session to see if you regain your Willpower.
